gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve a list of custom field configurations for my Jira project so that I can ensure all necessary fields are set up correctly.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of custom field configurations, including field IDs, names, and their current settings.

gold.user: As a developer, I need to fetch the configuration details of a specific custom field by its ID or key to understand how it is being used in the project.
gold.ideal: The API should return the configuration details of the specified custom field, including its context, options, and any associated settings.

gold.user: As a system administrator, I want to update the configuration of a custom field to modify its options and settings based on user feedback.
gold.ideal: The API should accept the updated configuration data and return a success message along with the updated configuration details.
